results.title: Suppressive effect of simvastatin on intramural small coronary arterial lesions in cholesterol-fed rabbits.
results.text_hl: These findings suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ induces lesion reduction not only by reducing the levels of circulating @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ but also by directly suppressing the development of @<m>DISEASE_Lipidoses</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008064 @@@lipoidosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Kato H, Okada R, Oogushi K, Emura S, Kishikawa H, Kawazoye S, Fukuoka M, Takashima T, Ohmori K. Suppressive effect of simvastatin on intramural small coronary arterial lesions in cholesterol-fed rabbits. Angiology. 1998 Mar;49(3):211-20. PMID: 9523544
citations.BibTeX: @article{9523544, title={Suppressive effect of simvastatin on intramural small coronary arterial lesions in cholesterol-fed rabbits.}, author={Kato H and Okada R and Oogushi K and Emura S and Kishikawa H and Kawazoye S and Fukuoka M and Takashima T and Ohmori K}, journal={Angiology}, volume={49}, number={3}, pages={211-20}}

results.title: Simvastatin ameliorates renal lipidosis through the suppression of renal CXCL16 expression in mice with adriamycin-induced nephropathy.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ ameliorates @<m>DISEASE_Lipidoses</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008064 @@@renal lipidosis@@@ through the suppression of renal @GENE_CXCL16 @GENE_66102 @@@CXCL16@@@ expression in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@adriamycin@@@-induced @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@nephropathy@@@.

citations.NLM: Wang C, Li Q, Zhen J, Xu Y, Sun S. Simvastatin ameliorates renal lipidosis through the suppression of renal CXCL16 expression in mice with adriamycin-induced nephropathy. Int J Clin Exp Pathol. 2015;8(12):15696-707. PMID: 26884839
citations.BibTeX: @article{26884839, title={Simvastatin ameliorates renal lipidosis through the suppression of renal CXCL16 expression in mice with adriamycin-induced nephropathy.}, author={Wang C and Li Q and Zhen J and Xu Y and Sun S}, journal={Int J Clin Exp Pathol}, volume={8}, number={12}, pages={15696-707}}
